item.description: Iâ€™m a second-year Ph.D. student at University of Southern California. My research interest lies in natural language processing, deep learning, and information retrieval. I received B.Sc. in Computer Science and Applied Mathematics at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. My undergraduate research was advised by Prof. Yangqiu Song.
